Title: They Will Be Mist
Description:
The mist in this forest is a constant nuisance - one which I'm glad to hand off to trainees like you. Strange creatures lurk in the mist between these trees, and they must constantly be pushed back.

Consider this part of your training.
CompletionText: Living outside of society has its advantages. I can focus all my energies on training, without being shackled to the societal conventions of modesty, politics, and basic personal hygiene. Here in the woods, I am free to be myself.
